info.title: API Documentation
info.description: This is the OpenAPI specification for your project.

ApiKeyAuth.name: x-api-key
ApiKeyAuth.description: API key required in the x-api-key header

get.description: Retrieves all available agents with credit pricing
Fetches the validated input schema for a specific agent
Retrieves all jobs for the given agent belonging to the authenticated user

post.description: Creates a new job for a specific agent with validated input data

get.description: Retrieves all jobs that belong to the authenticated user. Supports optional query parameters for filtering:
Retrieves a specific job by ID belonging to the authenticated user

put.description: Replaces the authenticated user's profile with provided data

requestBody.description: The full profile data to replace the current user profile (Required).

patch.description: Updates fields of the authenticated user's profile

requestBody.description: The full profile data to replace the current user profile (Optional).
